item.title: Need Help with 317 Portals
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Learning to be a coder, post:1, topic:352502”]yeah so i need help on how to make portals for 317 and making it like donor only can go here please help ill rep if u can

my msn is niravpatelp@hotmail.com[/quote]

find the objectID of the portal u want to use and then search in client.java (ctrl+f) find if(object
then make a new one.

if(objectID == #### //portal ID&& donator == 1) {
toX = ####; //Xcoord
toY = ####; //Ycoord
sM(“Welcome to the donatorzone”); //text can be changed
} else {
sM(“you need to be a donator to use this.”);
}

now it will teleport you to the donatorzone if ur a donator if u are not it will send a message that only donators can use this portal.

Read full topic
